title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan & Special Guest Raymundo
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan & Special Guest Raymundo
description:
While hanging out talking about all the things, Morgan asked Raymundo to share some life updates and he had things to share about kids, and a new car. Plus they talk about some childhood moments and what dances were like for them as teens. The two of them also gave some great Nashville recommendations for anyone visiting Tennessee in 2022.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
